title: Monk
caption: Kanban Board
description: Developing Monk taught me Next.js, server actions for Supabase, and best practices for building SaaS and CRUD apps. I used Prisma ORM for database tasks, Clerk for authentication, and Stripeâ€™s API for a pro-tier feature.
Inspired by Trello and Notion, Monk combines their best features into a fast, efficient app for managing notes and tasks.
